properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLE:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      02-00.80S 039-00.85W AND 03-09.92S 037-32.15W.
   B. 05 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-15.40S 039-32.58W AND 02-56.93S 037-22.37W.
   C. 07 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-29.15S 039-32.58W AND 03-05.58S 037-28.88W.
   D. 08 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-43.70S 038-47.55W AND 02-52.60S 037-19.12W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 482/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 09 MAR.
